displayName: RDS Oracle-SE2 Bring Your Own License - Maximum vCPU
rationale: Oracle's Cloud Licensing Policy allows for a maximum of 8 vCPU's for Oracle Standard Edition Two with a Bring Your Own Licensing Model.
recommended_action: Review and Update the instance configuration to fit within the 8 vCPU maximum allowed.
error_message: Invalid RDS Instance size for Licensing Model
ruleNames: RDS Oracle-SE2 Bring Your Own License - Maximum vCPU
